biotools.summary: Optimal algorithm for perfect phylogeny haplotyping.The perfect phylogeny haplotyping (PPH) problem is one of the many computational approaches to the haplotype inference (HI)  problem. This algorithm is one of the first O(nm) algorithms presented for the PPH problem.

bioschemas.name: opph
